Package com.flag4j.operations.concurrency

Class DenseThreadAllocator

java.lang.Object
com.flag4j.operations.concurrency.DenseThreadAllocator
public final class DenseThreadAllocator extends Object
This class contains methods useful for allocating threads to work on tensors concurrently.

  • Method Details

    • allocateThreads

      public static List<Thread> allocateThreads​(TensorBase dest, TensorBase src1, TensorBase src2, BinaryThreadFactory factory)
      Allocate and start threads for binary matrix operation.
      Parameters:
      dest - Destination matrix for transpose.
      src1 - Source matrix for transpose.
      src2 - Source matrix for transpose.
      Returns:
      A list of DenseAdditionWorker threads which will concurrently transpose the matrix.

    • allocateThreads

      public static List<Thread> allocateThreads​(TensorBase dest, TensorBase src, UnaryThreadFactory factory)
      Allocate and start threads for concurrent unary operation.
      Parameters:
      dest - Destination Tensor for the operation.
      src - Source tensor for operation to be applied to.
      Returns:
      A list of worker threads which will concurrently apply operation to the source tensor.
